headline: onsemi Introduces the Industry’s Most Advanced Analog and Mixed-Signal Platform
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., November 11, 2024--What’s New: Today, onsemi introduced the Treo Platform, an analog and mixed-signal platform built with Bipolar-CMOS-DMOS (BCD) process technology on an advanced 65nm node. This platform provides the foundation for a wide range of power and sensing solutions from onsemi including high-performance and low-power sensing, high-efficiency power management, and purpose-built communications devices. Using this single, scalable solution, customers can simplify and a
